attributes.action: Ban politicians from having oral sex with pigs (dead or alive).
attributes.background:
Bestiality is cross-species sexual activity between human and non-human animals. It is disgusting and not natural.

Politicians should set a good example to the country and not engage in such depraved activities such as inserting their members into the orifice of a pig.

rejection.details:
I'm sorry - we cannot accept duplicate petitions. We think this petition is similar to yours:

https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/109063

You might like to sign this petition instead. It is more likely to get more signatures that way.
